message.content:
To align a row of `div` elements to the right using Flexbox in CSS, you can use the following example code: HTML: ```html
Item 1
Item 2
Item 3
Item 4
``` CSS: ```css .flex-container { display: flex; flex-direction: row-reverse; /* This line will reverse the direction of the row */ } .flex-item { padding: 10px; } ``` In this example, the `.flex-container` class is set to display as a flex container with a `flex-direction` of `row-reverse`. This reverses the direction of the row, effectively aligning the items to the right. The `.flex-item` class provides padding for each individual item within the row.
